Layer descriptor for a convolution layer.

  • Constructor Details

    • ConvLayerDescriptor

      public ConvLayerDescriptor​(int inW, int inH, int inD, int size, int stride, int depth)
      Create a new convolution layer descriptor.
      Parameters:
      inW - - the width of the input data "image"
      inH - - the height of the input data "image"
      inD - - the pixel/channel depth of the input
      size - - the size of the kernel(side length)
      stride - - the step size the kernel moves with across input data.
      depth - - the number of kernels.

  • Method Details

    • getInputCount

      public int getInputCount()
      Specified by:
      getInputCount in interface LayerDescriptor
      Returns:
      the number of inputs that the layer expects.

    • getOutputCount

      public int getOutputCount()
      Specified by:
      getOutputCount in interface LayerDescriptor
      Returns:
      the number of outputs that the layer produces.

    • getWeightCount

      public int getWeightCount()
      Specified by:
      getWeightCount in interface LayerDescriptor
      Returns:
      the number of independent weights that the layer contains.
